targets.expression:
fields @timestamp, function_name, shutdown_reason, @message
| filter function_name = "$function_name"
| sort @timestamp desc
| filter ispresent(shutdown_reason)
| display  @timestamp, shutdown_reason, @message

fields @timestamp, @message, @logStream, @log
| sort @timestamp desc
| filter  @log LIKE "$function_name"
| filter @message =~ /WARN|ERROR|Exception/
| display @timestamp, @message

fields @timestamp, @message, @logStream, @log, function_name
| filter  (@log LIKE "$function_name" OR function_name LIKE "$function_name")
| filter @message LIKE "${log_filter}"
| sort @timestamp desc
| display @timestamp, @message

fields @timestamp, function_name, @message
| filter function_name = "$function_name"
| sort @timestamp desc
| display @timestamp, @message
